mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (user_id, username, password, name, nickname, brith_date, phone, email, address, confirm_service, confirm_userinfo, confirm_event) VALUES (USER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{brith_date}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{confirm_service}, #{confirm_userinfo}, #{confirm_event})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM TBL_USER WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT h.hashtag_name FROM TBL_USER_ASPECT ua JOIN TBL_HASHTAG_LIST h ON h.hashtag_id = ua.hashtag_id WHERE ua.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND is_selected = 1
